      org.guicebox.failover.FailoverModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Module
Direct Known Subclasses:
UdpFailoverModule
public abstract class FailoverModule
extends AbstractModule

Binds Failover as the Cluster implementation.

Note: This module sets Security properties:

  • networkaddress.cache.ttl = 0
  • networkaddress.cache.negative.ttl = 0
